amendment.description: An amendment to ensure that there be no limit or other prohibition for a vehicle transporting raw or unfinished forest product if such vehicle has a gross vehicle weight of 98,000 pounds or less.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to ensure that there be no limit or other prohibition for a vehicle transporting raw or unfinished forest product if such vehicle has a gross vehicle weight of 98,000 pounds or less.

action.text: By unanimous consent, the Duffy amendment was withdrawn.
House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A004) offered by Mr. Duffy.
